## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3ead54e8e11c1473a253605bf24a5bd6e4810187507cec485b9cf14872ffdf48)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'metronome-synth-user-lib' @ 20.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
